[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]
Well. I found an interesting article. Kinda freaky too
http://www.bbc.com/future/story/20150413-the-downsides-of-being-clever
[/bq]
well then
cons: I still have crippling anxiety and an occasional sense that everything I do is pointless and that I will never be happy

pros: my unwarranted egotism may be a little bit more justified than I thought.
